abstract: Anheuser-Busch InBev and the Justice Department said that they had jointly requested a temporary stay of an antitrust suit about the beer maker’s planned deal with Grupo Modelo, the maker of Corona beer and other brands.
snippet: Anheuser-Busch InBev and the Justice Department said that they had jointly requested a temporary stay of an antitrust suit about the beer maker’s planned deal with Grupo Modelo, the maker of Corona beer and other brands.

headline.main: Anheuser-Busch and U.S. in Talks to Resolve Antitrust Concerns
headline.print_headline: Anheuser-Busch and U.S. in Talks to Resolve Antitrust Concerns

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
